system.notes: Gives +30 to Strength Characteristic and +1 to Size. However Suffers -30 to all Agility Tests and -20 to Perception Tests. Armour is sealed and has 10 hours of air. Shielding provides +20 to Toughness Tests to Extreme Heat and Radiation. Power Cells last 10 hours before needing recharge or replacing.
